name: Lost Signal (Dominik_Dec, cybermuell, DorianSnowball)
description:
Defend against waves of enemies while you keep your signal alive!

Make it to the final wave and complete the transmission.

Place buildings and friendly AIs to survive the enemy forces!

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • LMB - Shoot / Build (in build mode)
  • Shift - Sprint
  • B - Building menu
  • ESC to leave build mode
  • SPACE - Jump

Made by 3 people as part of the LudumDare 46 Jam:

  • DorianSnowball
  • Cybermuell
  • Kojox
